comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: From the layout of the buildings I would almost guarantee that this is a rowing club.  The sloping full length deck is typical.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I have a strong suspicion that this is at St Ignatius College, Riverview,  on the Lane Cove River - looking west towards Linley Point.  Opinions anyone?

comment.author: 79583367@N02
comment._content: The pagoda on the right should identify the location - enough money for a flagpole too !

comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: I wonder if it is the Riverview School boatshed? Looking west, with Burns Bay around the corner and looking towards the Lane Cove River goo.gl/maps/VpgSr On this zoomed in view goo.gl/maps/sQ3Cv there is what looks like a gazebo roof in the right spot.
